Welcome to the Geospatial Community

Geospatial Community

Events Calendar


Our mission is to build a supportive and inclusive community where students, researchers, and professionals can grow their geospatial skills together. 🌱

Want to join our Geospatial Community workshops?


We run monthly skill sharing tutorial sessions where a member of our community teaches us something they have learned along the way.

Fill out this form to join and get the workshop link:

Upcoming Workshop

More spatial data in Python!

June 15th, 2-4pm AEST on Teams

Join us for an exciting session where Dr César Herrara Acosta (Griffith University) will take you on a new dive into the dynamic world of the Python programming language ecosystem! Building upon previous sessions, César will showcase Python libraries for (1) analysis and visualization of spatial data (e.g. geopandas, datashader, holoviews) and (2) basic computer vision algorithms (OpenCV). César will also make use of the incredibly versatile Jupyter Notebooks and Jupyter Lab frameworks, which empowers users with seamless workflows for code development, data exploration, and interactive presentations.
